title: "FinCrime Dynamics’ synthetic data is at the heart of new financial crime vaccines"
excerpt: "The recent news that FinCrime Dynamics has received its first investment for its financial crime vaccines raises an obvious question – what is a financial crime vaccine? Synthetizor in action FinCrime Dynamics (formally Ealax) is a UK-registered company based at St John’s Innovation Centre."
